titles.title: O For A Heart To Praise My God (familiar tune

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for a heart to praise my God A heart from sin set free A heart that's sprinkled with the blood So freely shed for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A heart resigned submissive meek My dear Redeemer's throne Where only Christ is heard to speak Where Jesus reigns alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A humble lowly contrite heart Believing true and clean Which neither death nor life can part From Him that dwells within{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A heart in every thought renewed And filled with love divine Perfect and right and pure and good A copy Lord of Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy nature gracious Lord impart Come quickly from above Write Thy new name upon my heart The new best name of Love{/lang-eng}
